txt.en: Complete 'The Anvil of Winterstith: Karazgar and Vethúg -- Tier 2'

You have completed 'The Anvil of Winterstith: Karazgar and Vethúg -- Tier 2'.
You have completed 'The Anvil of Winterstith: Hrímil Frost-heart -- Tier 2'.

Karazgar has come to the Anvil of Winterstith bolster his forces by laying claim to the Herald of Winter and her Frost-horde. If he succeeds, he will have the means to wipe out not only the expedition of dwarves in Ered Mithrin, but to lay siege to all of the Northern Kingdoms.
Complete 'The Anvil of Winterstith: Hrímil Frost-heart -- Tier 2'
